overview: The 'More Information' page provides a searchable and filterable interface for healthcare services, including navigation, theme toggling, and accessibility features. It displays service cards dynamically after initial skeleton loaders.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and links
Service cards grid with skeleton loaders
interactions: Click skip link to jump to main content
Toggle dark/light theme via theme-toggle button
Enter text in search input to filter services
Click filter chips to apply category filters
Change sort dropdown to reorder service cards
Navigate between pages using navbar links
data_flow: User input in search field triggers filtering of service cards
Filter chip clicks modify displayed categories
Sort dropdown changes order of service cards
Initial skeleton loaders replaced by fetched service data
Theme toggle updates global UI state
accessibility: Skip link enables keyboard users to bypass navigation
ARIA labels for navigation and filter groups
Visually hidden labels for search input
aria-current used for active page link
aria-hidden applied to decorative icons and loaders
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
Page view tracking for 'More Information' route
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content
Validate theme toggle updates UI and persists state
Test search input filters service cards dynamically
Confirm filter chips toggle active state and filter results
Check sort dropdown reorders services correctly
Assert skeleton loaders replaced with service cards after data load
Run accessibility audit for ARIA and keyboard navigation
